meanings.definition: The present participle of the verb 'to cum'.
meanings.sent1: She was caught in the act of cumming.
meanings.sent2: I heard him cumming from the other room.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked surprised to see the mouse cumming towards it.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the train cumming down the tracks was deafening.
meanings.sent5: The joy of cumming after a long day's work was evident on his face.

meanings.sent1: The Cumming family has a long history in this town.
meanings.sent2: I met Mr. Cumming at the event last night.
meanings.sent3: It was funny to see two people with the same surname Cumming together.
meanings.sent4: The Cumming surname stood out among the list of attendees.
meanings.sent5: Cumming is a common surname in that region.
